title: All Star Customer Support Agent Needed
job_overview:
EMAIL/CHAT CUSTOMER SUPPORT AGENT NEEDED.

We need a reliable customer support agent who is experienced in handling customer concerns, support issues, and technical issues.

We need someone who is quick to learn new features and is tech-savvy.

We are a graphic design software in a startup remote environment and we’re looking for someone to help take care of our customer’s concerns.

The job includes:

- Customer Support (Email & Chat) for our multiple software products
-  Technical Support (Email & Chat) for our multiple software products
- Hands-on software learning
- Learning product-specific features from the documentation available on Google Sheets, Google Docs, and Confluence
- Copying, pasting, and updating email templates
- Coordinating with our software programmers and relaying software tech issues
- Generating email/chat replies by providing the BEST solution to the customer
-  Figuring out solutions on your own and being proactive
-  Zoom calls/teaUpgrade to see actual infoetings
-  Updating documentation/protocol
- Using our Customer support software, which is HelpScout
- You would do other small, miscellaneous tasks like copying and pasting, or collecting data on spreadsheets or folders

*You will work with minimal supervision, manage your own time effectively, and maintain control over your role and responsibilities. 

Requirements: (Please read everything CAREFULLY!)

- Weekend work is a MUST, as that’s when most support tickets come in, around 30 mins per day
- You should also be fluent in English with good written skills
- You must have a fast and reliable internet connection, with your own laptop/PC to do your tasks
- You must have strong attention to detail, focus, and presence of mind
- You should be professional and be able to handle criticism and feedback without taking things personally
- You should be a fast learner and be able to adapt to change quickly.
- You must be able to work well with the team
- You must be flexible, detail-oriented, hardworking, and dependable

Working Schedule: (Please read everything CAREFULLY!)

-  Part time position with 20 hours per week including weekends (30 mins per day only during weekends)
- If additional hours are required on top of your part time work, we will pay you the same hourly rate
- You'll start as PART TIME (20 hours per week, 5 hours per day during Mondays, and your other hours - spread across the week)
- Log in time starts at 6 PM Manila time
- If we think you are performing well, we might consider transitioning you to a full time position in the coming months

How to apply:

Start your cover letter with “I know I’m your all-star customer support agent because” … followed by why you think you are perfect for this role.

Tell us:

- Why you’re the best applicant for the role
- Your experiences
- When can you start working

You will start PART-TIME, and depending on your performance, you COULD transition into a FULL-TIME job eventually.

If you fit the above skills and experience requirements, we shall be interviewing and hiring on a first-come, first-served basis immediately.

!!!! DO NOT APPLY if you have not read the job post well and if you're not willing to commit to a long-term job.
We need people who want to LEARN and GROW with the team and not the opposite.

We are not playing around here.

Applications that do not follow the cover letter requirements will be DISREGARDED.

Let's not waste each other's time here.  :)
